description:
USN-3712-1 fixed a vulnerability in libpng. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 Patrick Keshishian discovered that libpng incorrectly handled certain PNG files.
 An attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service.
title: libpng vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: libpng could be made to crash if it received a specially crafted file.
